This vignette will show you how to explore the important predictors of interest in BAM's landbird density models using `BAMExploreR` package. The machine learning models that BAM uses to produce these models provide an estimate of the importance of a given variable
For more information on the BAM landbird density models, please see the 'Introduction' vignette.
